description: Ask Alexa whats for lunch today, or at some day in the future at East Grand Rapids (Michigan) elementary schools. Lunch menu comes from the district for the month, and Alexa can help prepare your kids for the school day!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask lunch bot what's for lunch today
Alexa, ask lunch bot what's for lunch on January 20th
Alexa, ask lunch bot what will I be eating today
name: EGR Lunch Bot
shortDescription: Hot lunch for East Grand Rapids Public Schools (all elementary schools).
